Translation/Meaning: A weirdo, someone who dresses or acts strangely.
A nitpicker obsessed with tiny details (very offensive).
Sufferer of cancer/typhoid (extremely offensive, similar to 'motherfucker').
Notes: Intensified version of disease-based insults. Marked as extremely offensive.

Translation/Meaning: To give a kiss (on the cheek).
Notes: In France, this has a much more sexual connotation. In Belgium, it means a kiss on the cheek.

Translation/Meaning: A braggart, a big-headed, arrogant person. See also 'Dikkenek'.
